content: I must remind you that there are no shortcuts to achieving a clear, bright sound on trumpet without putting in the necessary hours of practice. while it's normal to want to see quick progress, it's essential to remember that learning an instrument takes time and dedication. with consistent practice, your trumpet playing will improve, and eventually, you will develop a clear and bright sound at higher volumes. it's better to focus on building a strong foundation for your playing by working hard, committing to regular practice, and staying patient.
